text:
Starry | Boston, MA | Full Time | ONSITE | Software Engineer, Cloud Services

Starry is inventing a cohesive system that brings the Internet to your home and distributes it throughout your home -- all wirelessly.

We're looking for Node.js engineers to help us build a better internet at Starry. Learn more here: https://starry.com/careers/software-engineer-cloud-services

We're also hiring for a bunch of other positions in Boston as well as New York (including marketing, engineering, sales, recruiting, design, etc.): https://starry.com/careers/
